ComicInfo.Summary:
Heavenside is heaving under a slow-motion eruption, as Doktor Sleepless consolidates his position.
But how many enemies did he make as John Reinhardt before he left on his world tour?
And what happens when he's finally confronted by the lover he left behind -- the lover who knows he had a massive mental breakdown?
